segment.source: Think about the type of app you're making and what a good trial or expiration strategy is for it.
segment.target: Think about the type of app you're making and what a good trial or expiration strategy is for it.

segment.source: For a trial version of a game, a good strategy is to limit the amount of game content that a user can play.
segment.target: For a trial version of a game, a good strategy is to limit the amount of game content that a user can play.

segment.source: For a trial version of a utility, you might consider setting an expiration date, or limiting the features that a potential buyer can use.
segment.target: For a trial version of a utility, you might consider setting an expiration date, or limiting the features that a potential buyer can use.

segment.source: For most non-gaming apps, setting an expiration date works well, because users can develop a good understanding of the complete app.
segment.target: For most non-gaming apps, setting an expiration date works well, because users can develop a good understanding of the complete app.

segment.source: Here are a few common expiration scenarios and your options for handling them.

segment.source: Trial license expires while the app is running
segment.target: Trial license expires while the app is running

segment.source: If the trial expires while your app is running, your app can:
segment.target: If the trial expires while your app is running, your app can:

segment.source: Do nothing.

segment.source: Display a message to your customer.

segment.target: Close.

segment.source: Prompt your customer to buy the app.
segment.target: Prompt your customer to buy the app.

segment.source: The best practice is to display a message with a prompt for buying the app, and if the customer buys it, continue with all features enabled.
segment.target: The best practice is to display a message with a prompt for buying the app, and if the customer buys it, continue with all features enabled.

segment.source: If the user decides not to buy the app, close it or remind them to buy the app at regular intervals.
segment.target: If the user decides not to buy the app, close it or remind them to buy the app at regular intervals.

segment.target: Trial license expires before the app is launched

segment.source: If the trial expires before the user launches the app, your app won't launch.
